title: 035 - Welcome To The Shahk Gang
description: On today's show, the guys discuss the formation of The Shahk Gang on GTA V and go over the different selection processes to get into the gang. They also cover whether or not anyone would fight Mike Tyson bare knuckles for 10 million dollars knowing full well that there is a good chance that they die. They also discuss choosing to flip a coin and either dying or getting 10 million dollars and the answers may surprise you a little bit. Today is a fun one. Stay safe this weekend, and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
